help.cmd_live: Configure a channel to receive twitch live alerts
help.cmd_roles: Configure a channel to display the roles selcor
help.cmd_poll: Creates a poll with pre-configured selectable emojis

live.add_ok: The Twitch live alert bot has been properly configured on the channel #{channel}
live.del_ok: The Twitch live alert bot has been properly removed from the channel #{channel}
live.ko: Only an administrator can use this command

roles.intro: Open the selector bellow and select all the roles you want
roles.add_ok: :white_check_mark: <@{user}>, you now have the selected roles !
roles.del_all_intro: To reset all your roles, click the button bellow
roles.del_all_ok: :white_check_mark: <@{user}>, all your roles have been reset.

admin.role_allowed: :white_check_mark: The role <@&{role}> has been allowed to use admin commands
admin.role_disallowed: :x: The role <@&{role}> is not allowed ot use admin commands anymore
admin.user_allowed: :white_check_mark: The user <@{user}> has been allowed to use admin commands
admin.user_disallowed: :x: The user <@{user}> is not allowed ot use admin commands anymore
